instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3462: What is 820-3462? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3462</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no wifi bluetooth SD card
threads.message:
Arrived with no wifi, bluetooth or SD card, otherwise works perfect. Board and IO board are spotless with no liquid damage. Replaced IO board with a known good board for testing but no change.

What to check first?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3462</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no wifi bluetooth SD card
threads.message:
All these perypheral are located on RIO board.
Inspect J4410 for corrosion, as RIO flex connectors too.
Try known good RIO flex/board.

Check <RESISTOR>R2686</RESISTOR>/88.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3462</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no wifi bluetooth SD card
threads.message: Solved. Minor corrosion found in J4410
